name: Old City Partners
overview:
Old City discovers high quality domestic and international investments for its clientele of family office, foundation and institutional investors. Old Cityâ€™s founding partners include a family office in Dallas, Texas which also manages private equity, real estate and socially motivated investments in the Southwest.

Old City looks for prudent approaches to opportunistic markets. Examples include high quality investment teams in emerging-market equity, distressed assets and concentrated developed-market equity. For liquid investments, Old City concentrates on non-correlated strategies in niches where compelling returns can be achieved without a lot of leverage.

funding_round.source_description: Promisec raises $2.4m from Old City Partners
